known_issues: 'Initialize Data' button not showing and admin spinner not clearing

existing_features.title: Fix the AdminInitButton component so that it correctly detects admin status and renders the 'Initialize Data' button for confirmed admin users. The button must be visible on both the DiscoverPage and ArtistsPage when the authenticated user is an admin.

Fix the admin detection loading state in AdminInitButton so that the spinner clears once admin status has been resolved. The component must not remain in an infinite loading/spinner state after the actor and identity are ready.

Audit the useActor hook readiness signaling to ensure that actor availability is correctly communicated to consumers like AdminInitButton. The actor must be considered 'ready' only when fully initialized, and dependent components must re-render when readiness changes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Audit the backend isAdmin check to ensure it correctly identifies the calling principal as an admin. Verify the admin principal is stored and compared correctly so that admin users are not incorrectly treated as non-admins.

projectName: Fix AdminInitButton visibility and admin spinner clearing
